briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy of Emixustat in Stargardt Disease
officialTitle: A Phase 3 Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Masked Study Comparing the Efficacy and Safety of Emixustat Hydrochloride With Placebo for the Treatment of Macular Atrophy Secondary to Stargardt Disease
summary:
The purpose of this study is to determine if emixustat hydrochloride reduces the rate of progression of macular atrophy compared to placebo in subjects with Stargardt disease.

Funding Source -- FDA OOPD

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Rate of Change in Total Area of Macular Atrophy, as Measured by Fundus Autofluorescence (FAF)
